titleStmt.title: Several objections against the reducement of interest propounded in a letter with the Answer thereunto.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Thomas, Sir, 1626-1697.
Brown, Ignatius, 1630-1679.
R. W.

notesStmt.note: Consists of two letters signed, I.S., and R.W., respectively.
Attributed by Wing to T. Culpeper.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
